Chapter 1 - Linear Regression with One Predictor Variable

Source: vignettes/kutnerALSM5e-01-Linear-Regression-with-One-Predictor-Variable.Rmd
kutnerALSM5e-01-Linear-Regression-with-One-Predictor-Variable.Rmd
library(kutnerALSM5e)
packageVersion("kutnerALSM5e")
## [1] '0.0.0.9000'

Regression analysis is a statistical methodology that utilized the relation between two or more quantitative variables so that a response or outcome variable can be predicted from the other, or others. This methodology is widely used in business, the social and behavioral sciences, the biological sciences, and many other
